# Homeschool Hive Knowledge Base

> Official documentation for Homeschool Hive - a platform connecting homeschool families with local groups, educational events, and community activities.

## About This Site

This knowledge base provides how-to guides and feature documentation for Homeschool Hive users. Content is organized for two primary audiences:

- **Parents and Families** - Finding groups, registering for events, managing RSVPs, payments, and family profiles
- **Group Leaders** - Creating and managing homeschool groups, organizing events, handling payments, and member administration

Base URL: https://kb.homeschoolhive.com

## Key Features Documented

- Group discovery with location-based search and map view
- Event registration with ticket reservations and waitlists
- Scholarship invoice generation for ESA/homeschool funding programs
- Stripe payment processing for groups
- Calendar subscription (iCal) for syncing events
- Member import via CSV for migrating existing groups
- Event series with recurring sessions and series passes
- Custom roles and permissions for group administration
- Two-factor authentication (TOTP) for account security
